frame.name: Change_resistance
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> changes a <fen>Patient</fen>'s ability to resist literal or figurative attack. This frame differs from Cause_change_of_strength only in that the <fen>Patient</fen> is restricted to acting as a defensive force, i.e., it can resist but not exert force.
<ex><fex name="Agent">We</fex> <t>bulwarked</t> <fex name="Patient">the castle</fex> <fex name="Attack">against the oncoming horde</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> makes the <fen>Patient</fen> more resistant to attack.</def-root>

FE.name: Patient
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Patient</fen> is the entity that is being made more resistant.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>Depictive phrase describing the actor of an action </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An act performed by an <fen>Agent</fen> that enables them to act upon the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> makes the <fen>Patient</fen> more resistant.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location at which the <fen>Agent</fen> makes the <fen>Patient</fen> more resistant.</def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition: <def-root>An event which causes the <fen>Patient</fen> to become more resistant.</def-root>

FE.name: Attack
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the literal or figurative <fen>Attack</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> is strengthening the <fen>Patient</fen> for.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: bulwark.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: provide with a stronger defense; fortify.

lexUnit.name: brace.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make stronger or firmer with wood, iron, etc.
